verses.text: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w this|strong="H4100"\w* turmoil \w of|strong="H1471"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w this|strong="H4100"\w* futile plotting \w of|strong="H1471"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w*,

\w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth conspiring, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7336"\w* consulting \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*,

\w to|strong="H4480"\w* snap \w their|strong="H7993"\w* \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w* \w and|strong="H4480"\w* \w fling|strong="H7993"\w* \w their|strong="H7993"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w away|strong="H7993"\w*?

\w He|strong="H8064"\w* whose throne \w is|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w laughs|strong="H7832"\w*, \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w mocks|strong="H3932"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* them \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H1696"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H1696"\w* hot \w anger|strong="H2740"\w* confounds them.

“\w This|strong="H6944"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w installed|strong="H5258"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.”

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*’s \w decree|strong="H2706"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*: “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w became|strong="H3205"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w*.

Only \w ask|strong="H7592"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* heir \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* lord \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* world \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* utmost bounds.

\w You|strong="H7489"\w* will \w break|strong="H7489"\w* \w them|strong="H1270"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w sceptre|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w them|strong="H1270"\w* like \w pottery|strong="H3627"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6258"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*: \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w warned|strong="H3256"\w*, \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* earth.

\w Serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* awe, kiss \w his|strong="H3068"\w* feet \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7461"\w*,

\w lest|strong="H6435"\w*, angry, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hurl \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* ruin; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w soon|strong="H4592"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* fury blaze. Happy \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w take|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.
